documentation.text: @dev Splitter migrates vaults between MakerDAO and Yield using flash minting.
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to int256
@dev Safe casting from uint256 to uint128

@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of yDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.
@dev Amount of yDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield
@dev Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating yDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

documentation.text: @dev Callback from `YDai.flashMint()`
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO
@dev Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of yDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.
@dev Amount of yDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield
@dev Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating yDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

devdoc.details: Splitter migrates vaults between MakerDAO and Yield using flash minting.

daiForYDai(address,uint256).details: Amount of dai debt that will result from migrating yDai debt from Yield to MakerDAO

makerToYield(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Transfer debt and collateral from MakerDAO to Yield Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.daiAmount: dai debt to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Denominated in Dai (= art * rate)
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in Yield, and low enough to make sure that debt left in MakerDAO is also collateralized.

makerToYieldBySignature(address,address,.details: Transfer debt and collateral from MakerDAO to Yield using an encoded signature for controller Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.daiAmount: dai debt to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Denominated in Dai (= art * rate)
params.deadline: Latest block timestamp for which the signature is valid
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to borrow)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from MakerDAO to Yield. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in Yield, and low enough to make sure that debt left in MakerDAO is also collateralized.

wethForDai(uint256).details: Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of dai in MakerDAO

wethForYDai(uint256).details: Minimum weth needed to collateralize an amount of yDai in Yield. Yes, it's the same formula.

yDaiForDai(address,uint256).details: Amount of yDai debt that will result from migrating Dai debt from MakerDAO to Yield

yieldToMaker(address,address,uint256,uin.details: Transfer debt and collateral from Yield to MakerDAO Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user }); Needs controller.addDelegate(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to migrate)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from Yield to MakerDAO. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in MakerDAO, and low enough to make sure that debt left in Yield is also collateralized.
params.yDaiAmount: yDai debt to move from Yield to MakerDAO.

yieldToMakerBySignature(address,address,.details: Transfer debt and collateral from Yield to MakerDAO using an encoded signature for controller Needs vat.hope(splitter.address, { from: user });

params.deadline: Latest block timestamp for which the signature is valid
params.pool: The pool to trade in (and therefore yDai series to migrate)
params.wethAmount: weth to move from Yield to MakerDAO. Needs to be high enough to collateralize the dai debt in MakerDAO, and low enough to make sure that debt left in Yield is also collateralized.
params.yDaiAmount: yDai debt to move from Yield to MakerDAO.
